QuestData.Title: Raptor Stalking
QuestData.Description: It is time to step up the challenge. Venturing into the jungle and bagging 10 lashtail raptors should be sufficient. They will certainly be stronger than the raptors you have already disposed of.$b$bThe lashtail raptors mainly stay southeast of here, near the Kal'ai Ruins.
QuestData.CompletionText: A true hunter sets his focus on his prey. You, my friend, seem more concerned with chit-chatting around the campfire. Now get out there and kill 10 Lashtails before I go and rid the entire bloody jungle of them in one hunt.
QuestData.RewardText: Hemet Nesingwary Jr. doubted you, but his doubts were unfounded. You are absolutely destroying these raptors.
